IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SEABURY HALL INSPIRES A HIGH STANDARD OF ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT THROUGH A BALANCED PROGRAM NURTURING RESPECT AND DIGNITY OF CHARACTER ROOTED IN OUR SCHOOL AND SPIRITUAL VALUES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: SEABURY HALL INSPIRES A HIGH STANDARD OF ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT THROUGH A BALANCED PROGRAM NURTURING RESPECT AND DIGNITY OF CHARACTER ROOTED IN OUR SCHOOL AND SPIRITUAL VALUES.
IRS990.Desc: THE SCHOOL IS AN INDEPENDENT, COLLEGE-PREPARATORY SCHOOL OF STUDENTS GRADES FIVE THROUGH TWELVE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: AUXILIARY ACTIVITIES INCLUDING RENTAL HOUSING FOR FACULTY AND SUMMER HOUSING FOR VISITING STUDENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SUMMER SCHOOL AND OTHER PROGRAMS TO SUPPLEMENT THE REGULAR CURRICULUM.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: FINANCIAL AID TO ASSIST THOSE STUDENTS WHO ARE IN NEED AND TO ENCOURAGE OTHER STUDENTS TO ATTEND.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: THE RT REV ROBERT L FITZPATRICK

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS CONSIST OF 17 INDIVIDUAL FUNDS FOR A VARIETY OF DONOR DESIGNATED PURPOSES.

THE SCHOOL, A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION, IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND ALSO FROM STATE OF HAWAII INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 237-23(B) OF THE HAWAII REVISED STATUTES. THE ACCOUNTING STANDARD ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES ADDRESSES THE DETERMINATION OF WHETHER TAX BENEFITS CLAIMED OR EXPECTED TO BE CLAIMED ON A TAX RETURN SHOULD BE RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. UNDER THAT GUIDANCE, THE SCHOOL MAY RECOGNIZE THE TAX BENEFIT FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. THE TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH A POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50% LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. THERE WERE NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IDENTIFIED OR RECORDED AS LIABILITIES FOR FISCAL YEARS 2023 OR 2022. THE SCHOOL FILES ITS FORMS 990 IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION AND THE OFFICE OF THE STATE'S ATTORNEY GENERAL FOR THE STATE OF HAWAII. THE SCHOOL IS GENERALLY NO LONGER SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR YEARS BEFORE 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NON DISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS PUBLISHED ON OUR WEBSITE SEABURYHALL.ORG UNDER THE ADMISSIONS TAB, ADMISSIONS TO SEABURY HALL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL STUDENTS ARE ELIGIBLE FOR FINANCIAL AID AND AN APPLICATION FOR FINANCIAL AID IS INCLUDED WITH THE ADMISSION PACKET. INFORMATION IS SENT TO THE SCHOOL STUDENT SERVICE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS WHICH PREPARES A FAMILY CONTRIBUTION CALCULATION AND VERIFIES SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION. THE INFORMATION IS THEN PRESENTED TO THE FINANCIAL AID COMMITTEE WHICH ALLOCATES THE BUDGETED FINANCIAL AID TO FAMILIES BASED UPON NEED.
FINANCIAL AID TO ASSIST THOSE STUDENTS WHO ARE IN NEED AND TO ENCOURAGE OTHER STUDENTS TO ATTEND.
A COPY OF THE 990 TAX RETURN WAS FURNISHED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL PRIOR TO BEING FILED.

THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS COMMUNICATED TO ALL STAFF AND BOARD OF TRUSTEES. ANY TRUSTEE WITH A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS EXPECTED TO RECUSE THEMSELVES FROM VOTING AND DISCLOSE THE CONFLICT. HOWEVER, SEABURY HALL HAS NOT IDENTIFIED ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST.
COMPENSATION FOR THE HEADMASTER IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND BASED UPON ANNUAL GOALS SET FORTH BY THE GOVERNING BODY.
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO COMPENSATED OFFICERS; HOWEVER, COMPENSATION WOULD BE DETERMINED BY THE HEADMASTER OR THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AS APPROPRIATE.
COPIES OF THE FORM 990 AND EXEMPT APPLICATION ARE AVAILABLE AT THE BUSINESS OFFICE UPON REQUEST.
